Title: Relates to carbon monoxide detectors in vehicles manufactured and assembled after July 1, 2021
Summary: Requires motor vehicles manufactured or assembled after July 1, 2021 that are sold or registered in this state to have an option to be equipped with a carbon monoxide (CO) detector.
LawCode: Add ยง384, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to carbon monoxide detectors in vehicles manufactured and assembled after July 1, 2021
